properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mbio mbio mbio
mbio itangazeni. x2
(Itangazeni injili
ya Bwana). x2
Mbio...

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Vijana wengi wamepotea,
vijana wengi wamepotea.
Wamepotea sababu ya pombe.
wamepotea sababu ya pombe,
mbio.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wasichana wengi wamepotea,
wasichana wengi wamepotea.
Wamepotea sababu ya pesa.
wamepotea sababu ya pesa,
mbio.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Wamama wengi wamepotea,
wamama wengi wamepotea.
Wamepotea sababu ya ugomvi.
wamepotea sababu ya ugomvi,
mbio.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Wazee wengi wamepotea,
wazee wengi wamepotea.
Wamepotea sababu ya raha.
wamepotea sababu ya raha,
mbio.
